project.name: Weddings By Mark - Gallery App
project.description: Self-hosted couples gallery sharing app with a dual-personality design: High-efficiency Dark Mode Admin vs. High-emotion Light Mode Client Gallery.
target_audience: Mark (Admin): Needs speed, clarity, and dark mode for editing environments.
Couples (Users): Need romance, elegance, and ease of use on mobile.

theme_strategy.implementation: Route-based theming. Admin routes (/admin) force 'dark' class. Gallery routes (/gallery, /shared) force 'light' mode.

typography.installation: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css

admin.structure: Sidebar Navigation + Top Bar + Content Area

admin_ui.style: Sharp edges (rounded-sm or rounded-md), dense spacing, dark backgrounds.

gallery_ui.style: Soft shadows, elegant typography, generous whitespace.

specifics.hero: Full viewport height (min-h-[80vh]), parallax background, centered serif text.
specifics.grid_item: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-sm aspect-[3/4] or aspect-[4/3]
specifics.lightbox: Immersive overlay, black background (95% opacity), minimal controls.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on Admin background to prevent banding and add depth.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows for Gallery cards. Sharp, technical shadows for Admin dropdowns.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px borders with low opacity (10-15%) for structure.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used in Admin Sidebar and Gallery Sticky Header (backdrop-blur-xl).

motion.admin: Fast (150ms), snappy, functional. Hover lifts, active states.
motion.gallery: Slow (500ms+), graceful, emotional. Staggered fade-ins for images, parallax scrolling.
motion.libraries: framer-motion (for layout transitions and gallery entrance)

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add Google Fonts import for Playfair Display and Manrope to index.css immediately.
3. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js to use the Gold/Champagne palette and ensure 'class' based dark mode is active.
4. ROUTING: Create a layout wrapper that applies the 'dark' class to the Admin section and removes it for the Gallery section.
5. ADMIN: Build the Admin Dashboard first. Focus on the Folder/File Manager logic. Use Shadcn Table and Dialog components.
6. GALLERY: Build the Public Gallery second. Focus on the Masonry Grid and Lightbox. Use custom CSS/Tailwind for the grid.
7. MOCK DATA: Use the provided image URLs to populate the initial state so the app looks 'lived in' immediately.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, grid items).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts or default blue colors.
Dark colors must be solid or subtle noise, NO dark gradients.
Use glassmorphism (backdrop-blur) for overlays and sticky headers.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
Spacing: Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never use AI emojis (robot, brain, etc.) as icons.
